patthana8.52:1.1: Nakilesasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana8.52:2.1: Nakilesavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakilesavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.52:3.1: Nakilesasampayuttañca nakilesavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.52:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
